ygData.subject: Re: Introduction
ygData.msgSnippet: I bought the game and don t know where to start so I just randomly choose a server. It just happen to be EM. I will check out Innoruuk server one of these days
ygData.messageBody:
I bought the game and don't know where to start so I just randomly choose a
server. It just happen to be EM. I will check out Innoruuk server one of
these days and when I do so, I will look for u guys. Don't have much time to
start another character nowadays. Got to work, take care of my girlfriend
and my family. Wish I could be like your Enchanter friend.

In the mean time, I will try to frequent this mailing list.

----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, August 27, 1999 2:59 PM
Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Introduction


> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
> 95% of us play in Innoruuk server. One chao-ah-aqua got a lvl 49
enchanter
> in CT server but he still managed to train a lvl 20 plus cleric & a lvl 20
> plus bard in Innoruuk in a short time. Why? Becoz all kakis very close
and
> helpful. We even intend to start a SG guild and accept mainly local kakis
> and those trust-worthy friends from other nations. We also got a big rich
> guy in Innoruuk who can extend any financial loan service to you. ;-P
>
> How come u are still in EM server???
>
> Ziltus Planeswalker
